member.name: T:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList
member.summary: Creates a multi selection check box group which is displayed and hidden on the client through the use of a custom drop-down box; choices can be dynamically created by binding the control to a data source

remarks.para: The DropDownCheckList was designed as a subclass of CheckBoxList, with a client-side library intended to provide cross-platform compatibility, at least with the modern versions of major browsers. It has been specifically tested with Internet Explorer 6.x, Netscape 7.x and 8.x, and Firefox 1.x. The JavaScript file DropDownCheckList.js contains the client-side object definition for the DropDownCheckList. To use the control, first copy the file DropDownCheckList.js to the following directory: wwwroot\aspnet_client\UNLV_IAP_WebControls\DropDownCheckList

Several properties are available to customize the display of the control. Use the DisplayBoxCssClass and/or DisplayBoxCssStyle properties to specify CSS styling for the display box. Likewise, DisplayTextCssClass and DisplayTextCssStyle specify the CSS styling for the display text, and CheckListCssClass and CheckListCssStyle denote CSS styling for the checklist box.

The rendering of a drop-down image in the display box is dependent on the DropImageSrc and DropImagePosition properties. If DropImageSrc is blank, or DropImagePosition is set to NoImage, no image is displayed in the drop-down box. If DropImageSrc is specified, the position of the image will either be Left, Right, or Both, as indicated by DropImagePosition.

The control's behavior is defined through several additional properties. The DropDownMode property determines how the checklist will display. If set to Inline, the checklist will expand within the surrounding HTML. If set to OnTop or OnTopWithShim, the checklist will be absolutely positioned on top of other HTML content. The "shim" option exists to offer compatibility with Internet Explorer 6.x and provides the ability to drop-down a checklist on top of windowed controls in IE.

The Separator property indicates the character(s) used to separate listed items. DisplayTextWidth specifies the maximum width in pixels available in the display box for listing checked options. When the listed options exceed this width, the text is truncated and the TruncateString property is appended. Typically, TruncateString is an ellipsis (â€¦) but may be set to other text or a blank string if desired. If you prefer to allow the display box to expand rather than truncate the text, set DisplayTextWidth to -1.

To indicate text to display when no options are checked, set the TextWhenNoneChecked property to the desired string. You may also specify whether checkbox labels or values (the Text and Value properties of a given ListItem respectively) are listed in the display box by setting the DisplayTextList property to either Labels or Values.

As a subclass of CheckBoxList, databinding properties such as DataSource and the Items collection are inherited. Upon form submission, the developer may inspect the Items collection for selected checkboxes, just as one would with a CheckBoxList. The DropDownCheckList also exposes two overloaded utility methods: SelectedLabelsToString() and SelectedValuesToString(). Each returns the selected items, listed as a single concatenated string. The overloads allow the developer to specify list separators and text delimiters.

member.example:
Here is an example of a complete .aspx page which uses the DropDownCheckList control, demonstrating several properties and the methods SelectedLabelsToString() and SelectedValuesToString(). <%@ Page Language="c#" AutoEventWireup="true" %> <%@ Register TagPrefix="cc1" Namespace="UNLV.IAP.WebControls" Assembly="DropDownCheckList" %> DropDownCheckList Sample

DropDownCheckList Sample

Click the drop-down box to select options

member.name: M:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.ClientJavascriptCodeScript
member.summary: Generates a string containing a <script> tag identifying the client-side javascript code to include on the page; this string is registered with the page when a DropDownCheckList control is present.

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DropDownMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the drop-down checklist will appear inline or on top of other HTML content

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayBoxCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) class used when rendering the display box

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayBoxCssStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) style attribute used when rendering the display box

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DropImageSrc
member.summary: Gets or sets the src attribute of the image that is rendered when DropImagePosition is set to Left, Right, or Both
member.remarks: By default, this property is String.Empty, which means that no image is rendered.

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DropImagePosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the position relative to the display box where the drop-down image is rendered
member.remarks: To specify the src attribute for the drop-down image, set the DropImageSrc property.

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayTextWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width in pixels of text in the display box
member.remarks: When the checked boxes make a string of text that exceeds the DisplayTextWidth amount in width, the display text is truncated to the maximum width, and the TruncateString is appended (by default, an ellipsis). To allow the string to expand to its full width without truncating, set DisplayTextWidth to -1.

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayTextPaddingLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of pixels to pad between the display text and the left edge of the display box (or the drop-down image if present)

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayTextPaddingTop
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of pixels to pad between the display text and the top edge of the display box

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayTextPaddingRight
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of pixels to pad between the display text and the right edge of the display box (or the drop-down image if present)

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayTextPaddingBottom
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of pixels to pad between the display text and the bottom edge of the display box

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayTextCssStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) class used when rendering the display text

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.DisplayTextCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) style attribute used when rendering the display text

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.TextWhenNoneChecked

member.summary: Gets or sets the text to use as a separater when listing checked choices in the display text

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.TruncateString

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownCheckList.ClientCodeLocation
member.summary: Returns or sets the location of the client JavaScript code file

remarks.para: The ClientCodeLocation path is the url written as the src attribute of a <script> tag as the control is rendered. By default, this location is /aspnet_client/UNLV_IAP_WebControls/DropDownCheckList/DropDownCheckList.js
If the client javascript file is not in the location specified by ClientCodeLocation, client-side javascript errors will occur and the control will not function properly.

member.name: T:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DisplayTextListEnum
member.summary: Supplies options for determining if labels or values will be listed in the display box for checked boxes.

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DisplayTextListEnum.Labels
member.summary: Indicates that labels should be listed in the display text for checked boxes.

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DisplayTextListEnum.Values
member.summary: Indicates that values should be listed in the display text for checked boxes.

member.name: T:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropImagePositionEnum
member.summary: Supplies options for specifying the position for rendering the drop-down image in a DropDownCheckList control, relative to the control's display box.

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropImagePositionEnum.Left
member.summary: Positions the drop-down image to the left of the display box

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropImagePositionEnum.Right
member.summary: Positions the drop-down image to the right of the display box

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropImagePositionEnum.Both
member.summary: Renders the drop-down image both left and right of the display box

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropImagePositionEnum.NoImage
member.summary: Specifies a drop-down image should not be rendered

member.name: T:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.CssStyleUtility
member.summary: Utility class for working with Cascading Style Sheet (CSS) style attributes
member.remarks: The CssStyleUtility class encapsulates a StringDictionary, allowing for the setting and retrieval of CSS style properties. The constructor takes a string parameter, representing the text in a style attribute, and parses the string to populate the internal StringDictionary. The StyleTable property provides access to the internal dictionary, and the ToString() method outputs the items of the dictionary as a complete CSS style string.

member.name: M:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.CssStyleUtility.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Constructs a CssStyleUtility object, given a string of text in the form of a CSS style attribute (in the form of "key1: value1; key2: value2;" etc.)
member.param: the CSS style attribute text to be parsed

member.name: M:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.CssStyleUtility.ToString
member.summary: Joins the property items within this CssStyleUtility object to return a single text string in the form of a CSS style attribute

member.name: P:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.CssStyleUtility.StyleTable
member.summary: Returns the internal dictionary of style properties encapsulated within this CssStyleUtility object

member.name: T:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownModeEnum
member.summary: Supplies options for determining if the checklist will drop down inline with other HTML items on the page, or on top of other HTML content.

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownModeEnum.Inline
member.summary: Renders the checklist using a CSS "position: relative" style attribute, placing the checklist inline with other HTML content

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownModeEnum.OnTop
member.summary: Renders the checklist using a CSS "position: absolute" style attribute, placing the checklist on top of other HTML content

member.name: F:UNLV.IAP.WebControls.DropDownModeEnum.OnTopWithShim
member.summary: Renders the checklist using a CSS "position: absolute" style attribute, with an additional <iframe> tag which acts as a shim; this allows for Internet Explorer versions 5.5 and greater to properly render the checklist above other windowed controls.
